org.tms.api.io

Interface TitleableIOOption<T extends TitleableIOOption<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of BaseIOOptions in this TitledPageIOOptions
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseIOOption<T>, StyleableIOOption<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DOCOptions, org.tms.io.options.FormattedPageIOOptions, HTMLOptions, PDFOptions, RTFOptions, org.tms.io.options.TitledPageIOOptions

    public interface TitleableIOOption<T extends TitleableIOOption<T>>
extends StyleableIOOption<T>
    An BaseIOOptions where the output can be titled.

    Note: TitleableIOOption methods only affect export operations.

    Since:
    "1.1"
    Version:
    "1.1"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getTitle()
      Return the title string to apply to the output.
      int getTitleFontSize()
      Returns the font size, in pixels, to use to display the title string in the output.
      boolean hasTitle()
      Returns true if this BaseIOOptions has been assigned a title string.
      T withTitle(String title)
      Assign a title string to display in the output on export.
      T withTitleFontSize(int fontSize)
      Set the font size, in pixels, to use when drawing the title string on export.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.tms.api.io.StyleableIOOption

        getDefaultColumnWidth, getDefaultFontSize, getFontFamily, getHeadingFontSize, getRowLabelColumnWidth, withDefaultColumnWidthInInches, withDefaultColumnWidthInPx, withDefaultFontSize, withFontFamily, withHeadingFontSize, withRowLabelColumnWidthInInches, withRowLabelColumnWidthInPx

      • Methods inherited from interface org.tms.api.io.BaseIOOption

        canExport, canImport, getFileFormat, isColumnLabels, isIgnoreEmptyColumns, isIgnoreEmptyRows, isRowLabels, withColumnLabels, withColumnLabels, withIgnoreEmptyColumns, withIgnoreEmptyColumns, withIgnoreEmptyRows, withIgnoreEmptyRows, withRowLabels, withRowLabels
